name: NFCTag
desc: An object that represents an NFC tag object.

items.name: var isAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a detected tag is available.

items.name: case iso15693(NFCISO15693Tag)
items.desc: Gets a tag as an ISO 15693 tag object.

items.name: case iso7816(NFCISO7816Tag)
items.desc: Gets a tag as an ISO 7816 tag object.

items.name: case feliCa(NFCFeliCaTag)
items.desc: Gets a tag as a FeliCa tag object.

items.name: case miFare(NFCMiFareTag)
items.desc: Get a tag as a MIFARE tag object.
